price: 104. Y dijimos después a los hijos de Israel: «Habitad la tierra (de la Gran Siria) y, cuando llegue la promesa de la resurrección, os haremos comparecer a todos».
arabic: وَقُلۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ لِبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱسۡكُنُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعۡدُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ جِئۡنَا بِكُمۡ لَفِيفٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqul'nā min baʿdihi libanī is'rāīla us'kunū al-arḍa fa-idhā jāa waʿdu al-ākhirati ji'nā bikum lafīfan
